techmeme.title: Meta says a small cluster of WhatsApp accounts linked to the Iran-backed hacking group APT42 targeted people affiliated with the Biden and Trump administrations (Shannon Bond/NPR)
The French AI startup called H, formerly Holistic, says three of its five co-founders are leaving over "operational differences", after raising $220M in May (The Information)
Sources: Apple plans to unveil new iPhones, AirPods, and Apple Watches on September 10; developer logs: Apple has ramped up testing of four new M4 Mac models (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Q&A with AI pioneer Yoshua Bengio on advocating for AI regulation, his support for California's AI safety bill, AI achieving human-level intelligence, and more (Shirin Ghaffary/Bloomberg)
Email: Elon Musk says X plans to award stock options based on employees' anticipated impact, and tells them to submit a one-page summary of their contributions (Kylie Robison/The Verge)
